bibl.title: History of the Graeco-Latin Fable. Translated by Leslie A. RAY. Revised and Updated by the Author and Gert Jan VAN DIJK. Volume Two. The Fable during the Roman Empire and in the Middle Ages. (Mnemosyne. Supplementum 207.)
